segments.text: Did Bean send these dirty jokes to you , too ? Look !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a creep ! Phony good luck e-mails are one thing , but sexual harassment is crossing the line .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No wonder he asked for my address first-he just wants to harass me !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could try using a spam filter to reject stuff that's obviously pornographic or anything else you don't want .
segments.speaker: S2
